channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 4

item.title: CVE-2020-0903|2024-08-04T06:18:03.459Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202019%20cumulative%20update%204
item.description: A cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Exchange server, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.
